original_text: Now in the twelfth month, which is the month of Adar, on the thirteenth day of the same, when the king's command and edict were about to be carried out, on the very day when the enemies of the Jews hoped to gain the mastery over them, the reverse occurred: the Jews gained mastery over those who hated them.
korean_text: 아달월 곧 열두째 달 십삼일은 왕의 어명을 시행하게 된 날이라 유다인의 대적들이 그들을 제거하기를 바랐더니 유다인이 도리어 자기들을 미워하는 자들을 제거하게 된 그 날에

sentences.original_text: which is the month of Adar,
on the thirteenth day of the same,
when the king's command and edict were about to be carried out,
sentences.korean_translation: 왕의 명령과 조서가 시행되려 할 때에,

sentences.original_text: when the enemies of the Jews hoped to gain the mastery over them,
sentences.korean_translation: 유대인의 대적들이 그들을 지배하기를 바랐던 때에,

sentences.original_text: the Jews gained mastery over those who hated them.
sentences.korean_translation: 유대인들이 자기를 미워하는 자들을 지배하게 되었더라.
